segment.source: Xbox One Developer Mode activation
segment.target: Xbox One Developer Mode activation

segment.source: How to activate Developer Mode so you can switch between Retail Mode and Developer Mode.
segment.target: How to activate Developer Mode so you can switch between Retail Mode and Developer Mode.

segment.source: Xbox One Developer Mode activation
segment.target: Xbox One Developer Mode activation

segment.source: How Developer Mode works
segment.target: How Developer Mode works

segment.source: Activate Developer Mode on your retail Xbox One console
segment.target: Activate Developer Mode on your retail Xbox One console

segment.source: Switch between Retail and Developer Mode
segment.target: Switch between Retail and Developer Mode

segment.source: How Developer Mode works
segment.target: How Developer Mode works

segment.source: Xbox One has two modes, Retail Mode (1) and Developer Mode (2).
segment.target: Xbox One has two modes, Retail Mode (1) and Developer Mode (2).

segment.source: In Retail Mode, the console is in the state that any customer or user of an Xbox One console would use: you can play games and run apps as a user.
segment.target: In Retail Mode, the console is in the state that any customer or user of an Xbox One console would use: you can play games and run apps as a user.

segment.source: In Developer Mode, you can develop software for the console, but you cannot play retail games or run retail apps.
segment.target: In Developer Mode, you can develop software for the console, but you cannot play retail games or run retail apps.

segment.source: Developer Mode can be enabled on any retail Xbox One console.
segment.target: Developer Mode can be enabled on any retail Xbox One console.

segment.source: After Developer Mode is enabled, you can switch back and forth between Retail (2a) and Developer Modes (2b).
segment.target: After Developer Mode is enabled, you can switch back and forth between Retail (2a) and Developer Modes (2b).

segment.source: Important When you activate Developer Mode on Xbox One, you are opting into Xbox system updates for a developer preview release that includes experimental and early pre-release software.
segment.target: Important When you activate Developer Mode on Xbox One, you are opting into Xbox system updates for a developer preview release that includes experimental and early pre-release software.

segment.source: This means that some popular games and apps will not work as expected, and you may experience occasional crashes and data loss.
segment.target: This means that some popular games and apps will not work as expected, and you may experience occasional crashes and data loss.

segment.source: If you leave the developer preview, your console will factory reset and you will have to reinstall all of your games, apps, and content.
segment.target: If you leave the developer preview, your console will factory reset and you will have to reinstall all of your games, apps, and content.

segment.source: Note You cannot activate Developer Mode on Xbox One if you are part of an existing preview program such as the Xbox One Beta program.
segment.target: Note You cannot activate Developer Mode on Xbox One if you are part of an existing preview program such as the Xbox One Beta program.

segment.source: You can leave an existing preview program by using the Xbox Preview Dashboard app.
segment.target: You can leave an existing preview program by using the Xbox Preview Dashboard app.

segment.source: Xbox One modes
segment.target: Xbox One modes

segment.source: Activate Developer Mode on your retail Xbox One console
segment.target: Activate Developer Mode on your retail Xbox One console

segment.source: Start your Xbox One console.
segment.target: Start your Xbox One console.

segment.source: Search for and install the Dev Mode Activation app from the Xbox One store.
segment.target: Search for and install the Dev Mode Activation app from the Xbox One store.

segment.source: Navigate to My games & appsApps.
segment.target: Navigate to My games & appsApps.

segment.source: Dev Mode Activation app
segment.target: Dev Mode Activation app

segment.source: Open the Dev Mode Activation app.
segment.target: Open the Dev Mode Activation app.

segment.source: Note Please make sure that you read the disclaimers carefully.
segment.target: Note Please make sure that you read the disclaimers carefully.

segment.source: As part of activating Xbox for development, you will be getting early pre-release builds.
segment.target: As part of activating Xbox for development, you will be getting early pre-release builds.

segment.source: To play games and apps, you will need to switch to Retail Mode.
segment.target: To play games and apps, you will need to switch to Retail Mode.

segment.source: Sideloaded apps will only work in Developer Mode.
segment.target: Sideloaded apps will only work in Developer Mode.

segment.source: Note the code displayed in the Dev Mode Activation app.
segment.target: Note the code displayed in the Dev Mode Activation app.

segment.source: Activation Step 5
segment.target: Activation Step 5

segment.source: Go to developer.microsoft.com/xboxactivate.
segment.target: Go to developer.microsoft.com/xboxactivate.

segment.source: Sign in to Dev Center with your Dev Center account.
segment.target: Sign in to Dev Center with your Dev Center account.

segment.source: Enter the activation code displayed in the Dev Mode Activation app.
segment.target: Enter the activation code displayed in the Dev Mode Activation app.

segment.source: Note You have a limited number of activations associated with your account.
segment.target: Note You have a limited number of activations associated with your account.

segment.source: After Developer Mode has been activated, Dev Center will indicate you have used one of the activations associated with your account.
segment.target: After Developer Mode has been activated, Dev Center will indicate you have used one of the activations associated with your account.

segment.source: Activation Step 8
segment.target: Activation Step 8

segment.source: Click Agree and activate.
segment.target: Click Agree and activate.

segment.source: This will cause the page to reload, and you will see your device populate in the table.
segment.target: This will cause the page to reload, and you will see your device populate in the table.

segment.source: Note Terms for the Xbox One Developer Mode Activation Program agreement can be found here.
segment.target: Note Terms for the Xbox One Developer Mode Activation Program agreement can be found here.

segment.source: After you’ve entered your activation code, your console will display a progress screen for the activation process.
segment.target: After you’ve entered your activation code, your console will display a progress screen for the activation process.

segment.source: After activation completes, you will have to wait for your console to update to the required preview build.
segment.target: After activation completes, you will have to wait for your console to update to the required preview build.

segment.source: This may take several hours; please be patient.
segment.target: This may take several hours; please be patient.

segment.source: Activation Step 11
segment.target: Activation Step 11

segment.source: After activation has completed, open the Dev Mode Activation app and click Switch and restart to go to Developer Mode.
segment.target: After activation has completed, open the Dev Mode Activation app and click Switch and restart to go to Developer Mode.

segment.source: Note that this will take longer than usual.
segment.target: Note that this will take longer than usual.

segment.source: Activation Step 12
segment.target: Activation Step 12

segment.source: Switch between Retail and Developer Mode
segment.target: Switch between Retail and Developer Mode

segment.source: After Developer Mode has been enabled on your console, use Dev Home to switch between Retail Mode and Developer Mode.
segment.target: After Developer Mode has been enabled on your console, use Dev Home to switch between Retail Mode and Developer Mode.

segment.source: To learn more about starting and using Dev Home, see Introduction to Xbox One tools.
segment.target: To learn more about starting and using Dev Home, see Introduction to Xbox One tools.

segment.source: To switch to Retail Mode, use Dev Home and click Leave developer mode.
segment.target: To switch to Retail Mode, use Dev Home and click Leave developer mode.

segment.source: This will restart your console in Retail Mode.
segment.target: This will restart your console in Retail Mode.

segment.source: Activation Step 13
segment.target: Activation Step 13

segment.source: To switch to Developer Mode, use the Dev Mode Activation app.
segment.target: To switch to Developer Mode, use the Dev Mode Activation app.

segment.source: Open the app and click Switch and restart.
segment.target: Open the app and click Switch and restart.

segment.source: This will restart your console in Developer Mode.
segment.target: This will restart your console in Developer Mode.

segment.source: Activation Step 14
segment.target: Activation Step 14

segment.target: See also
